name: IMMZ.DT.19.Dengue
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Dengue vaccine between 9 and 45 years of age

action.title: Immunize Patient for Dengue - No Doses at 9 years old
action.description: Provide Dengue immunizations – using the "Dengue vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Dengue vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses" and "Patient age" >= "9 years"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Dengue because no doses at 9 years old

action.title: Immunize Patient for Dengue - 1 Dose given 6 months ago
action.description: Provide Dengue immunizations – using the "Dengue vaccine immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Dengue vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose" and "Last dose given" >= "6 months ago"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Dengue because 1st dose given 6 months ago

action.title: Immunize Patient for Dengue - 2 Doses given 6 months ago
action.description: Provide Dengue immunizations – using the "Dengue vaccine immunization – 2 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Dengue vaccine immunization history" = "2 dose" and "Last dose given" >= "6 months ago"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Dengue because 2nd dose given 6 months ago
